evidence.text:
EUNICE: Brazilian Bar Association. Can you put the coffee on?
MARIA JOS: Sure, Mrs. Paiva. Want me to fix you dinner?
EUNICE: Stay calm. You take care of the kids, and I'll deal with these men.

MARIA JOS: Mr. Machado's out front. Should I put some coffee on?
EUNICE: I'll pick the kids up at school. Just taker care of lunch, please.
MARIA JOS: What would you like me to make?
EUNICE: Whatever there is.
MARIA JOS: And... Mrs. Paiva, could you see about my pay, too? I know you've got an awful lot on your plate, but Mr. Paiva only paid me through December.
